info.title: Package Highway is used for defining a Highway node and its accessible API Endpoints

post.summary:
AccessName returns details and publicly available information about the Peer given calling node
has permission to access. i.e "prad.snr" -> "firstname online profilePic city"

AccessService creates a new signing key for the calling node in order to be authorized to
access the service. It is only allowed to be called once per node.
CreateBucket creates a new bucket for the calling nodes service.

CreateChannel creates a new Publish/Subscribe topic channel for the given service.
The calling node must have already registered a service for the channel.

CreateObject defines a new object to be utilized by the calling node's service. The object will
be placed in the Highway Service Graph and can be used in channels and other modules.
DeleteBlob deletes the given file from the calling node's service IPFS storage.
DeleteBucket deletes the given bucket if the calling node is the owner of the bucket.
DeleteChannel deletes the given channel if the calling node is the owner of the channel.
DeleteObject deletes the given object if the calling node is the owner of the object.
DownloadBlob downloads a file or buffer from the calling node's service IPFS storage.

ListenChannel subscribes the calling node to the given channel and returns all publish events
as a stream.
ParseDid parses a potential DID string into a DID object.

ReadBucket lists all the blobs in the given bucket. The calling node must have access to the
bucket.

ReadChannel lists all peers subscribed to the given channel, and additional details about
the channels configuration.
ReadObject returns the details of the given object provided its DID or Label.

RegisterName registers a new ".snr" name for the calling node. It is only allowed to be called
once per node.

RegisterService registers a new service for the calling node. The calling node must have
already been enabled for development.

ResolveDid resolves a DID to its DID document if the DID is valid and the calling node has
access to the DID Document.
SyncBlob synchronizes a local file from the calling node to the given service's IPFS storage.

UpdateBucket updates the configuration of the given bucket. The calling node must have access
to the bucket.
UpdateChannel updates the configuration of the given channel.
UpdateName updates the public information of the calling node.
UpdateObject modifies the property fields of the given object.
UpdateService updates the details and public configuration of the calling node's service.
UploadBlob uploads a file or buffer to the calling node's service IPFS storage.

MsgProvisionAction.description:
- ACTION_UNSPECIFIED: The service is being provisioned.
 - ACTION_ACCEPT: The service is being updated.
 - ACTION_REJECT: Action is to decline the request.
 - ACTION_CANCEL: Action is to cancel the request.
 - ACTION_DELETE: Action is to delete the request.
 - ACTION_UPDATE: Action is to update the request.

peer.description: Owner is the peer that originated the message.

did.description: Did is the identifier of the channel.

object.description: Data is the data being sent.

metadata.description: Metadata is the metadata associated with the message.

channelChannelMessage.description: ChannelMessage is a message sent to a channel.

highwayv1MsgAccessNameResponse.title: MsgAccessName is a response to a request for a name

highwayv1MsgAccessServiceResponse.title: AccessServiceResponse is a response to a request for a service

label.description: Label is human-readable name of the bucket.

description.description: Description is a human-readable description of the bucket.

did.description: Did is the identifier of the object.

bucketDid.description: Bucket is the did of the bucket that contains this object.

fields.description: Fields are the fields associated with the object.

objectObjectDoc.description: ObjectDoc is a document for an Object stored in the graph.

label.title: Label is the name of the field

type.title: Type is the type of the field

did.description: Did is the identifier of the field.

stringValue.title: String is the value of the field

numberValue.title: Number is the value of the field

boolValue.title: Float is the value of the field

arrayValue.title: Array is the value of the field

timeStampValue.description: Time is defined by milliseconds since epoch.

geopointValue.title: Geopoint is the value of the field

blobValue.title: Blob is the value of the field

blockchainAddrValue.title: Blockchain Address is the value of the field

metadata.title: Metadata is additional info about the field

objectObjectField.description: ObjectField is a field of an Object.

label.title: Label is the name of the field

type.title: Type is the type of the field

did.description: Did is the identifier of the field.

items.title: Entries are the values of the field

objectObjectFieldArray.description: ObjectFieldArray is an array of ObjectFields to be stored in the graph object.

label.title: Label is the name of the field

did.description: Did is the identifier of the field.

value.title: Value is the value of the field

metadata.title: Metadata is additional info about the field

label.title: Label is the name of the field

did.description: Did is the identifier of the field.

value.title: Value is the value of the field

metadata.title: Metadata is additional info about the field

objectObjectFieldBlockchainAddress.description: ObjectFieldBlockchainAddress is a field of an Object for blockchain addresses.

label.title: Label is the name of the field

did.description: Did is the identifier of the field.

value.title: Value is the value of the field

metadata.title: Metadata is additional info about the field

objectObjectFieldBool.description: ObjectFieldBool is a boolean field of an Object.

label.title: Label is the name of the field

type.title: Type is the type of the field

did.description: Did is the identifier of the field.

latitude.description: Latitude is the geo-latitude of the point.

longitude.title: Longitude is the geo-longitude of the field

metadata.title: Metadata is additional info about the field

objectObjectFieldGeopoint.description: ObjectFieldGeopoint is a field of an Object for geopoints.

label.title: Label is the name of the field

did.description: Did is the identifier of the field.

value.title: Value is the value of the field

metadata.title: Metadata is additional info about the field

label.title: Label is the name of the field

did.description: Did is the identifier of the field.

value.title: Value is the value of the field

metadata.title: Metadata is additional info about the field

objectObjectFieldText.description: ObjectFieldText is a text field of an Object.

label.title: Label is the name of the field

did.description: Did is the identifier of the field.

value.title: Value is the value of the field

metadata.title: Metadata is additional info about the field

objectObjectFieldTime.description: ObjectFieldTime is a time field of an Object.

objectObjectFieldType.description:
- OBJECT_FIELD_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: ObjectFieldTypeUnspecified is the default value
 - OBJECT_FIELD_TYPE_STRING: ObjectFieldTypeString is a string or text field
 - OBJECT_FIELD_TYPE_NUMBER: ObjectFieldTypeInt is an integer
 - OBJECT_FIELD_TYPE_BOOL: ObjectFieldTypeBool is a boolean
 - OBJECT_FIELD_TYPE_ARRAY: ObjectFieldTypeArray is a list of values
 - OBJECT_FIELD_TYPE_TIMESTAMP: ObjectFieldTypeDateTime is a datetime
 - OBJECT_FIELD_TYPE_GEOPOINT: ObjectFieldTypeGeopoint is a geopoint
 - OBJECT_FIELD_TYPE_BLOB: ObjectFieldTypeBlob is a blob of data
 - OBJECT_FIELD_TYPE_BLOCKCHAIN_ADDRESS: ObjectFieldTypeETU is a pointer to an Ethereum account address.
objectObjectFieldType.title: ObjectFieldType is the type of the field

method.description: Method is the method used to create the DID. For the Sonr network it is "sonr".

network.description: Network is the network the DID is on. For testnet it is "testnet". i.e "did:sonr:testnet:".

id.title: id is the trailing identifier after the network. i.e. "did:sonr:testnet:abc123"

paths.description: Paths is a list of paths that the DID is valid for. This is used to identify the Service.

query.description: Query is the query string that was used to create the DID. This is followed by a '?'.

fragment.description: Fragment is the fragment string that was used to create the DID. This is followed by a '#'.

registryDid.description:
Did represents a string that has been parsed and validated as a DID. The parts are stored
in the individual fields.

context.description: Context is the context of the DID document. This is used to identify the Service.

id.description: Id is the DID of the document.

controller.description: Controller is the DID of the controller of the document. This will be the individual user devices and mailboxes.

verificationMethod.description: VerificationMethod is the list of verification methods for the user.

authentication.description: Authentication is the list of authentication methods for the user.

assertionMethod.description: AssertionMethod is the list of assertion methods for the user.

capabilityInvocation.description: CapabilityInvocation is the list of capability invocation methods for the user.

capabilityDelegation.description: CapabilityDelegation is the list of capability delegation methods for the user.

keyAgreement.description: KeyAgreement is the list of key agreement methods for the user.

service.description: Service is the list of services or DApps that the user has access to.

alsoKnownAs.description: AlsoKnownAs is the list of ".snr" aliases for the user.

metadata.description: Metadata is the metadata of the service.

registryDidDocument.description: DidDocument is the document that describes a DID. This document is stored on the blockchain.

configuration.title: The updated configuration for the service

metadata.title: The metadata for any service information required

registryPeer.title: Basic Info Sent to Peers to Establish Connections

registryProfile.title: General Information about Peer passed during Authentication

id.description: ID is the DID of the service.

type.description: Type is the type of the service.

serviceEndpoint.description: ServiceEndpoint is the endpoint of the service.

metadata.description: Metadata is the metadata of the service.

registryService.description: Service is a Application that runs on the Sonr network.

transportType.description: TransportType is the type of transport used to connect to the service.

network.description: Network is the network the service is on.

supportedProtocols.title:
SupportedProtocols is the list of protocols supported by the service.
(e.g. "channels", "buckets", "objects", "storage")

routingKeys.description: RoutingKeys is the list of routing keys that the service supports.

registryServiceEndpoint.description: ServiceEndpoint is the endpoint of the service.

registryServiceProtocol.description:
ServiceProtocol are core modules that can be installed on custom services on the Sonr network.

 - SERVICE_PROTOCOL_UNSPECIFIED: SERVICE_PROTOCOL_UNSPECIFIED is the default value.
 - SERVICE_PROTOCOL_BUCKETS: SERVICE_PROTOCOL_BUCKETS is the module that provides the ability to store and retrieve data.
 - SERVICE_PROTOCOL_CHANNEL: SERVICE_PROTOCOL_CHANNEL is the module that provides the ability to communicate with other services.
 - SERVICE_PROTOCOL_OBJECTS: SERVICE_PROTOCOL_OBJECTS is the module that provides the ability to create new schemas for data on the network.
 - SERVICE_PROTOCOL_FUNCTIONS: SERVICE_PROTOCOL_FUNCTIONS is the module that provides the ability to create new functions for data on the network.

registryServiceType.description:
ServiceType is the type of service that is being registered.

 - SERVICE_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: SERVICE_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED is the default value.
 - SERVICE_TYPE_DID_COMM_MESSAGING: SERVICE_TYPE_APPLICATION is the type of service that is a DApp.
 - SERVICE_TYPE_LINKED_DOMAINS: SERVICE_TYPE_SERVICE is the type of service that is a service.
 - SERVICE_TYPE_SONR: SERVICE_TYPE_SONR is the type of service that is a DApp.

id.description: ID is the DID of the verification method.

type.description: Type is the type of the verification method.

controller.description: Controller is the DID of the controller of the verification method.

publicKeyHex.description: PublicKeyHex is the public key of the verification method in hexidecimal.

publicKeyBase58.description: PublicKeyBase58 is the public key of the verification method in base58.

blockchainAccountId.description: BlockchainAccountId is the blockchain account id of the verification method.

registryVerificationMethod.description: VerificationMethod is a method that can be used to verify the DID.

registryVerificationMethodType.description:
- TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: TYPE_UNSPECIFIED is the default value.
 - TYPE_ECDSA_SECP256K1: TYPE_ECDSA_SECP256K1 represents the Ed25519VerificationKey2018 key type.
 - TYPE_X25519: TYPE_X25519 represents the X25519KeyAgreementKey2019 key type.
 - TYPE_ED25519: TYPE_ED25519 represents the Ed25519VerificationKey2018 key type.
 - TYPE_BLS_12381_G1: TYPE_BLS_12381_G1 represents the Bls12381G1Key2020 key type
 - TYPE_BLS_12381_G2: TYPE_BLS_12381_G2 represents the Bls12381G2Key2020 key type
 - TYPE_RSA: TYPE_RSA represents the RsaVerificationKey2018 key type.
 - TYPE_VERIFIABLE_CONDITION: TYPE_VERIFIABLE_CONDITION represents the VerifiableCondition2021 key type.

code.description: The DID of the service that is being accessed.

didDocument.description: The Resulting DID Document of the access request.

v1MsgAccessResponse.description: MsgAccessResponse is used to respond to a MsgAccess.

v1MsgDeleteBlobResponse.title: MsgDeleteBlobResponse is a response to a request to delete a blob

v1MsgDownloadBlobResponse.title: MsgDownloadBlobResponse is a response to a request to download a blob

code.description: The DID of the peer that is being exchanged with.

didDocument.description: The did document verifying the exchange.

v1MsgExchangeResponse.description:
MsgExchangeResponse is used to respond to an Exchanged message between
two services.

v1MsgProvisionResponse.description: MsgProvisionResponse is the returned response from a MsgProvision.

v1MsgPublishResponse.description: MsgPublishResponse is the returned response from a MsgPublish.

code.description: The DID of the service that is being queried.

didDocument.description: The DID Document of the resulting query.

objectDoc.description: The object that was optionally returned.

v1MsgQueryResponse.description: MsgQueryResponse is used to respond to a MsgQuery.

code.description: The DID of the service that is being registered.

objectDoc.description: The Resulting Registered Object of the request.

result.description: The JSON encoded result of the request.

v1MsgRequestResponse.description: MsgRegisterResponse is used to respond to a MsgRegister.

v1MsgResolveDidResponse.title: MsgResolveDidResponse is a response to a request to resolve a DID

code.description: The DID of the service that is being subscribed to.

status.description: Status is the current step of the subscription process.

objectDoc.description: ObjectDoc is the registered object of the channel.

v1MsgSubscribeResponse.description: MsgSubscribeResponse is used to respond to a MsgSubscribe.

v1MsgSubscribeResponseStatus.description:
Status is the step in the Subcription process.

 - STATUS_UNSPECIFIED: The service is being subscribed to.
 - STATUS_PENDING: The service is being updated.
 - STATUS_OPEN: Status is to decline the request.
 - STATUS_CANCEL: Status is to cancel the request.
 - STATUS_CLOSE: Status is to delete the request.
 - STATUS_ERROR: Status is to update the request.

v1MsgSyncBlobResponse.title: MsgSyncBlobResponse is a response to a request to sync a blob

pinned.title: Pinned is true if the blob is pinned to IPFS

v1MsgUploadBlobResponse.title: MsgUploadBlobResponse is a response to a request to upload a blob
